message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think will be very valuable to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit too high to go that low. Would you be willing to consider $9,500? It's a good compromise that I believe is fair to both of us.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,000? I'm trying to stay within my budget
